column2: film=[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
June 30]]th [[1966]]) played [[Celeborn]] in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]] and [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

column1: His last name is Hungarian and is pronounced Cho-Kash.

column2: Celeborn is more fixed in his beliefs and methods than Galadriel, which is his failing, perhaps. As a team, they work well, although apparently they only have sex once every 2,000 years or so.
